movie_title: Should we farm octopus? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Is it OK to farm octopus when they have been shown to experience feelings? Beth and Neil discuss thi

vocabulary.definition: a savoury flavor considered one of the five basic tastes
vocabulary.example: She added a dash of soy sauce to enhance the umami taste of the dish.

vocabulary.definition: able to experience feelings or sensations such as pleasure and pain
vocabulary.example: The study showed that octopuses are sentient creatures capable of complex behaviors.

vocabulary.definition: the series of changes an organism goes through from birth to death
vocabulary.example: Understanding the life cycle of butterflies involves studying their stages from egg to adult.

vocabulary.definition: preferring to live alone or in isolation
vocabulary.example: The snow leopard is a solitary animal that roams the high mountains alone.

vocabulary.definition: the state of being imprisoned or confined
vocabulary.example: The zoo aims to provide a safe environment for animals in captivity.

vocabulary.definition: an exchange or compromise between two competing factors
vocabulary.example: The company made a trade-off between cost and quality when sourcing materials for the product.
